scripts.package: cd dist && for f in * ; do ([ -d "$f" ] && cd $f && zip ../$f.zip *) ; done
scripts.package:unbundled: rm -rf node_modules unbundled.zip && npm i --only=prod && zip -r unbundled.zip src/* node_modules/*
scripts.package:large: rm -rf node_modules large.zip && npm i && zip -r large.zip src/* node_modules/*
scripts.predeploy: npm i && npm run build && npm run package:unbundled && npm run package:large
scripts.deploy: cd infrastructure && npm run cdk deploy
scripts.destroy: cd infrastructure && npm run cdk destroy
